column1: Lieutenant '''Robert Quilter Gilson''' ([[25 October]] [[1893]]- [[1 July]] [[1916]]) was a childhood friend of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. Gilson
column2: Tolkien and [[Geoffrey Bache Smith]] attended [[King Edward's School]] in [[Birmingham]] together
column3: and served in the [[World War I|First World War]]. He was killed by a shell on the first day of the [[Battle of the Somme]].<ref>[[John Garth]]
